title: Brand new house for sale in Hokandara
details:
This beautiful home is located in hokandara town in a superb neighborhood

Breathtaking view of the paddy fields from almost all parts of the house. very good ventilation in the house and fresh breeze flowing though the paddy fields.

4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms
Hotwater
2-3 car parking space
2 access roads to the property
6 perch land
1800 sqft (approx)

Price 23 million
Contact us for more details and appointments
